title: Leading men 's hair coloring brands in the U.S. 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Just For Men and lowest at Brand Grecian 5.
The difference of Sales in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 137.9.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars 138.0 is found at Brand Just For Men and the minimum is found at Grecian 5 where Brand is 0.1.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Just For Men and lowest at Brand Grecian 5.
The difference of Sales in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 137.9.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Brand Just For Men and lowest at Brand Grecian 5.
Second maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars is found at Brand Just For Men Autostop.
The highest Brand Just For Men has 137.9 more Sales in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand Grecian 5.
Brand Just For Men is higher than any other Brands with value 138.0, followed by Just For Men Autostop, and Just For Men Control GX. Down to Brand Grecian 5 with the lowest value 0.1.
The Brand Grecian 5 has 6.74 times less Sales in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is 204.8 if we add up values of all Brands.

data.Brand: Just For Men Touch of Gray
